    • Method Detail

      • getLists

        java.util.List<ContactList> getLists(java.lang.String accessToken,
                                   java.lang.String modifiedSinceTimestamp)
                                     throws ConstantContactServiceException
        Implements the Get lists for an account operation by calling the ConstantContact server side.
        Parameters:
        accessToken - Constant Contact OAuth2 access token.
        Returns:
        Returns a list of ContactList containing values as returned by the server on success;
        An exception is thrown otherwise.
        Throws:
        ConstantContactServiceException - When something went wrong in the Constant Contact flow or an error is returned from server.

      • addList

        ContactList addList(java.lang.String accessToken,
                  ContactList list)
                    throws ConstantContactServiceException
        Implements the add list for an account operation by calling the ConstantContact server side.
        Parameters:
        accessToken - Constant Contact OAuth2 access token.
        list - The ContactList that was added, when successful.
        Returns:
        Returns the newly created list containing values as returned by the server on success;
        An exception is thrown otherwise.
        Throws:
        ConstantContactServiceException - When something went wrong in the Constant Contact flow or an error is returned from server.

      • getList

        ContactList getList(java.lang.String accessToken,
                  java.lang.String listId)
                    throws ConstantContactServiceException
        Implements the get individual list for an account operation by calling the ConstantContact server side.
        Parameters:
        accessToken - Constant Contact OAuth2 access token.
        listId - List id.
        Returns:
        The ContactList containing values as returned by the server on success;
        An exception is thrown otherwise.
        Throws:
        ConstantContactServiceException - When something went wrong in the Constant Contact flow or an error is returned from server.

      • updateList

        ContactList updateList(java.lang.String accessToken,
                     ContactList list)
                       throws ConstantContactServiceException
        Updates a Contact List identified by its List Id
        Parameters:
        accessToken - Constant Contact OAuth2 access token.
        list - The List to update
        Returns:
        The ContactList containing values as returned by the server on success;
        An exception is thrown otherwise.
        Throws:
        ConstantContactServiceException - When something went wrong in the Constant Contact flow or an error is returned from server.

      • getContactsFromList

        ResultSet<Contact> getContactsFromList(java.lang.String accessToken,
                                     java.lang.String listId,
                                     java.lang.Integer limit,
                                     java.lang.String modifiedSinceTimestamp)
                                       throws ConstantContactServiceException
        Implements the Get contacts from an individual list operation by calling the ConstantContact server side.
        Parameters:
        accessToken - Constant Contact OAuth2 access token.
        listId - List id to retrieve contacts for.
        limit - Maximum number of contacts to retrieve. Default is 50.
        Returns:
        Returns a list of Contact containing values as returned by the server on success;
        An exception is thrown otherwise.
        Throws:
        ConstantContactServiceException - When something went wrong in the Constant Contact flow or an error is returned from server.

      • deleteList

        boolean deleteList(java.lang.String accessToken,
                 java.lang.String listId)
                   throws ConstantContactServiceException
        Implements the delete ContactList operation of the Contact Lists API by calling the ConstantContact server side.
        Parameters:
        accessToken - Constant Contact OAuth2 access token.
        listId - Unique contact id of the contact to delete.
        Returns:
        Returns true if operation succeeded; an exception is thrown otherwise.
        Throws:
        ConstantContactServiceException - When something went wrong in the Constant Contact flow or an error is returned from server.
